directions.step: Preheat the oven to 350 degrees Fahrenheit.
Place the apples in a glass dish. (a few inches deep).
Mix the raisins, almond slivers, apple jam, 2/3 of the rum 1/3 of the sugar and 1/2 the cinnamon in a small bowl.
Spoon the mixture into the middle of each cored apple, dividing everything evenly.
Cover the glass dish with plastic wrap and cook in the microwave for 2-3 minutes per apple. (The standard portion of four apples cooks perfectly in about 10 minutes.)
Take the dish out of the microwave, remove the plastic wrap and sprinkle one tablespoon of sugar and one teaspoon of cinnamon over the center of each apple.
Put in the oven for about 5 minutes or until the each apple is a nice golden brown color.
Take out of the oven, place each apple in its own bowl, divide the liquid into each bowl evenly.
Put the rest of the rum in a small bowl and put in the microwave for about 10 seconds.
Spoon a tablespoon of rum over each apple and set alight to give it a fancy flambé effect and serve.
